mapper.select: select id, logger_name, level, trace_id, start_time, log_type, ip, rpc_id, thread_name, project_name, use_time, hash_code, other, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user from sys_trace_info where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_trace_info( id, logger_name, level, trace_id, start_time, log_type, ip, rpc_id, thread_name, project_name, use_time, hash_code, other, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user) values (#{id}, #{loggerName}, #{level}, #{traceId}, #{startTime}, #{logType}, #{ip}, #{rpcId}, #{threadName}, #{projectName}, #{useTime}, #{hashCode}, #{other}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_trace_info where delete_flag = 0
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
